fi.sorberIT
类 MySAXHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      fi.sorberIT.MySAXHandler
所有已实现的接口：
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class MySAXHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler

MySAXHandler class is used to parse XML file by some specific methods and set attributes' value. Actually, it is a class which just need to be extended, because SAXParser has done most things for us. There are three methods called startElement(),endElement(),characters() which will run automatically when SAXParser start to parse the xml file.

There are some differences between Dom and SAXParser. Dom will put all the xml file into computer's memory and build a tree so that we can traverse all the elements in the file. SAXParser will read the file line by line. It doesn't need to put the file into memory so it's better using SAXParser when the file is huge.

作者：
Song Xin

characters

public void characters(char[] ch,
                       int start,
                       int length)
                throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
This method is used to get the attributes' value from the xml file and call the set method to set the attributes' value so that we can put these values into database. Using the boolean variable to control when should we read the next attribute and when should we set these attributes's value.

Pay attention to the time we use set method to set the attributes' value. If we set the value when we haven't finished getting the needed value, the attributes' value in database will be null. So we should use boolean variable to control the time and set the value after we have already got all the needed values.

指定者：
接口 org.xml.sax.ContentHandler 中的 characters
覆盖：
类 org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler 中的 characters
抛出：
org.xml.sax.SAXException

printTotalGames

public void printTotalGames()
This method is used to print the total numbers of the games or musics
